SEARCH
Module com.example.orders
Package DataAccess

Class OrderDAO

java.lang.Object
DataAccess.AbstractDAO<Orders>
DataAccess.OrderDAO
public class OrderDAO extends AbstractDAO<Orders>
The OrderDAO extends the AbstractDAO class, which implements all the CRUD operations. The methods from OrderDAO class are called from the corresponding BLL class.
